Key Match Events: Jason Heyward hit a go-ahead, two-run homer and made a dazzling defensive play as the Houston Astros beat the Seattle Mariners 4-3 to clinch their fourth consecutive AL West championship.
Alex Bregman and Kyle Tucker each added a solo home run for the Astros.
Post-Match Reflections: The Astros are headed to the postseason for the eighth year in a row.

Others: Houston Astros' Jason Heyward gestures to the dugout as he rounds the bases on his two-run home run against the Seattle Mariners during the fifth inning of a baseball game Tuesday, Sept. 24, 2024, in Houston.
